channel.title: Posts on Jiaxin Zhuang
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Jiaxin Zhuang

item.description:
About Me

I am a 2nd year master student at Dept. of Data science and computing, Sun Yat-sen University. Currently, i am advised by Prof. Ruixuan Wang & Wei-shi Zheng and Jianguo Zhang at iSEE-STSU. I received my B.Sc. egree from Dept. of Data science and computing, Sun Yat-sen University in 07/2018. I was a research intern of Human Cyber Physical Intelligence Integration Lab, adverised by Prof. Liang Lin.

My research interest lie within deep learning for computer vision, particalurly in interpretability, imabalanced data and unsupverised learning, clustering.

News: I am seeking for Ph.D from 2021 Fall. Feel free to reach out to me if you are interested.

Research Interest

Computer Vision, Interpretability, Data imbalanced, Clustering, Unsupervised learning.

Selected Publication

  • Jiaxin Zhuang, Jiabin Cai*, Ruixuan Wang, Jianguo Zhang, Weishi Zheng. CARE: Class Attention to Regions of Lesion for Classification on Imbalanced Data. In Proc. of MIDL 2019, London. [openreview] [bib] [poster] [slides] [zhihu]

Awards & Honors

  • Jiaxin Zhuang*, Weipeng Li*, Ruixuan Wang, Jianguo Zhang, Weishi Zheng. Rank3 (out of 77 teams) MICCAI 2018 grand challenge “ISIC 2018: Skin Lesion Analysis Towards Melanoma Detection”, Task 3 “Lesion Diagnosis”, 2018. Note: top 2 teams used additional public dataset to train models. [Code], [Report]
  • Ruoyu Lan, Wenbo Feng, Jiaxin Zhuang. Meritorious Winner, Mathematical Contest In Modeling, 2017
  • Keyao Bing, Jiahao Rao, Jiaxin Zhuang, Lishan Huang, Lin Meng. Rank 10 (Among 1117 teams) , Molecular Screening of Drugs Based on Artificial Intelligence, 2018
  • Jiaxin Zhuang. Chinese University Students Intelligent Design Competition, Third prize, 2017.
  • The Second Prize Scholarship, 2015
  • The Third Prize Scholarship, 2014

Teaching

  • TA for Deep learning (Practice Course), Sun Yat-sen Univeristy, Spring 2019
  • TA for Deep learning, Sun Yat-sen Univeristy, Spring 2018
